text: Lai Xiaomin (; July 21, 1962 â€“ January 29, 2021) was a Chinese businessman and senior economist. He was party chief and chairman of the board of China Huarong Asset Management from September 2012 to April 2018. Lai was born in Ruijin, Jiangxi, China. In January 5, 2021, Lai was sentenced to death for bribery, embezzlement, and bigamy. He was executed on January 29, 2021 at the age of 58. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese businesspeople Category:Chinese economists Category:Chinese criminals Category:Executed people Category:People from Jiangxi
title: Lai Xiaomin
